secondBlock.title: About us
description: One of the biggest hazards and serious concerns in oil and gas fields is toxic and explosive gases, and constant preparedness for such challenges is the key. Ensuring safety under such conditions is the foundation of all our activities.
The major focus and objective for our services are earlier detection of gas concentrations in the atmosphere, avoiding negative impact on personnel health as well as preventing man-made disasters.

Akbarys H2S Protection is a suite of professional services and innovative solutions that includes the basic barriers consisting of supervisory, gas detection systems, PA systems, PPE and BA supply systems, muster points and shelters-in-place, as well as training, regular drills and site access control.
Akbarys Group is the leading provider of gas safety services in the CIS. Our experience covers a wide range of operations for onshore and offshore projects with high H2S concentrations.

sixthBlock.title: Akbarys Protection
descriptions: As part of a strategy to develop the domestic market of manufacturers of goods needed for petroleum industry, under the TCO leadership and initiative, supported by KPO B.V, Kazakh company Akbarys invested in establishing a new asset and building a factory  to manufacture NH15-K escape hoods.
On 9th August 2019, Akbarys Protection's new factory was inaugurated in Nur-Sultan.

The factory capacity with using new innovative technologies will amount to over 40,000 masks a year, thereby providing local customers with world-class quality products and ability to export to the Caspian Sea region.
The total investment into the project, which started in 2017, has been equal to 1 billion Tenge around.
